pageDescription: Learn from industry experts at the forefront of cybersecurity innovation and defense

speakers.name: Dr. Saumya Bhadauria
speakers.bio: Assistant Professor at ABV-IIITM Gwalior. Pioneers high-level synthesis and hardware security for integrated circuits. Has over 418 citations on Google Scholar for her reliable design techniques.
speakers.talkTitle: IoT and Industrial Cyber Physical System (CPS) Security

speakers.name: P. Santhi Thilagam
speakers.bio: Professor and former HOD of CSE department at NIT Surathkal. Known for research in data mining, database security, and distributed systems. Contributes extensively to academic leadership and scholarship.

speakers.name: Dr. Aditya japa
speakers.bio: Lecturer in Computer Science at Ulster University, UK. Researches machine learning, data analytics, and IoT applications. Contributes to smart systems through interdisciplinary innovations.
speakers.talkTitle: Hardware Security Attacks on Edge Devices and Defence Techniques

speakers.name: Dr. Imran Malik
speakers.bio: Lecturer in Electronic Engineering at Queen's University Belfast. Expert in RF/microwave/mmWave circuits and antenna design. Advances wireless communication technologies through his research.

speakers.name: Dr Padmavathi U.
speakers.bio: Assistant Professor at Shiv Nadar University Chennai. Researches deep learning and computer vision. Won Best Paper Award at IEEE ANTS-2021 for her contributions.

speakers.name: Dr Pradeep Kumar Bhale
speakers.bio: Assistant Professor at IIITDM Kancheepuram. Researches RF/microwave engineering and antenna design. Enhances wireless communication with work on millimeter-wave systems and terahertz systems.
speakers.talkTitle: Attack Detection and Mitigation for IoT Ecosystems: Adaptive, Scalable, and Lightweight Approaches

speakers.name: Dr. Nikhil Tripathi
speakers.bio: Assistant Professor at IIT (ISM) Dhanbad. Researches network security, focusing on vulnerability assessment and DoS/DDoS defenses. Has over 590 citations on Google Scholar for his impactful work.

speakers.name: Mr. Prajjwal Govil
speakers.bio: IT Analyst at Tata Consultancy Services, Bangalore. Brings 8+ years of experience in full-stack development and enterprise solutions. Skilled in Java, Spring Boot, and cloud technologies for scalable IT systems.

speakers.name: Prof. Durga Toshniwal
speakers.bio: Professor at IIT Roorkee in Computer Science. Renowned for work in AI, data mining, and intelligent transportation systems. Boasts over 6,300 citations on Google Scholar for her research.

speakers.name: Prof. Rajat Subhra Chakraborty
speakers.bio: Professor and Associate Dean at IIT Kharagpur. Renowned for pioneering research in hardware security and VLSI design. Ranked among the top 2% of global Computer Science researchers in 2022.

speakers.name: Dr. Monosij Maitra
speakers.bio: Assistant Professor at IIT Kharagpur, specializing in cryptography. Known for advanced encryption systems for secure data computation. Won IBM Best PhD Thesis award for his doctoral work at IIT Madras.

speakers.name: Dr. Bodhisatwa Mazumdar
speakers.bio: Associate Professor at IIT Indore. Known for extensive research in hardware security and side-channel attacks. Accumulated over 1,800 citations on Google Scholar for his contributions.

speakers.name: Dr.Sharad Sinha
speakers.bio: Associate Professor and Dean of Faculty Affairs at IIT Goa. Focuses on reconfigurable computing, computer architecture, and embedded systems. Contributes significantly to both research and academic leadership.
speakers.talkTitle: Architecture and Methods for Fine Grained Detection and Mitigation of Cache Side Channel Attacks

speakers.name: Dr. Rajesh Gupta
speakers.bio: Professor and HOD of CSE department at Nirma University. Specializes in IoT, cloud computing, and network security. Known for significant contributions to both academia and leadership.

speakers.name: Dr. Vimal Kumar Dwivedi
speakers.bio: Lecturer in Electrical and Electronic Engineering at Ulster University, UK. Focuses on energy harvesting, wireless sensor networks, and IoT. Advances sustainable technology solutions through his work.

speakers.name: Dr. Gaurav Varshney
speakers.bio: Assistant Professor at IIT Jammu. Focuses on cybersecurity, including anti-phishing and multi-factor authentication. Earned over 540 citations on Google Scholar for his research.

speakers.name: Prof. Shashikala Tapaswi
speakers.bio: Professor at ABV-IIITM Gwalior. Specializes in image/video processing, mobile networks, and IoT security. Holds patents for indoor tracking and image dehazing devices.
